title: The Sexiest, Last-Minute Amazon Prime Day Lipstick Deals from a Beauty Editor
description: When it comes to replenishing your favorite beauty products, you could wait until they completely run out - or you could be the brilliant shopper we know you are and stock up while everything is on major sale for Amazon Prime Day. We are in the latter camp (we're self-proclaimed geniuses), which means we've been hitting "add to cart" nonstop over the last few days. Yes, we've found plenty of deals worth purchasing, from under-$25 finds to everyday practical items, one of the top items on our lists? Lip products. And not just any lip product - though we love a viral lip sleeping mask as much as the next person - lipsticks. Not only is the right lipstick key to any makeup look, but one swipe of the right product can easily change your entire vibe. Whether you're looking for something glossy, something matte, something long-lasting, or something in between - we've got you covered. Ahead, we rounded up the sexiest editor-approved lipstick deals for Amazon Prime Day that you don't want to miss out on. If your lips could talk, they'd tell you to start shopping. While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

When it comes to replenishing your favorite beauty products, you could wait until they completely run out — or you could be the brilliant shopper we know you are and stock up while everything is on major sale for Amazon Prime Day. We are in the latter camp (we're self-proclaimed geniuses), which means we've been hitting "add to cart" nonstop over the last few days.

Yes, we've found plenty of deals worth purchasing, from under-$25 finds to everyday practical items, one of the top items on our lists? Lip products. And not just any lip product — though we love a viral lip sleeping mask as much as the next person — lipsticks. Not only is the right lipstick key to any makeup look, but one swipe of the right product can easily change your entire vibe.

Whether you're looking for something glossy, something matte, something long-lasting, or something in between — we've got you covered. Ahead, we rounded up the sexiest editor-approved lipstick deals for Amazon Prime Day that you don't want to miss out on. If your lips could talk, they'd tell you to start shopping.

Our Favorite Amazon Sexy Lipstick Deals to Shop

  • A gorgeous lip tint under $10: Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Matte Lip Tint at $8, originally $13
  • The perfect matte lipstick for date night: The Lip Bar Liquid Matte Lipstick at $12, originally $14
  • A sheer lippie that gives your lips, but better: Laura Geller Italian Marble Sheer Lipstick at $17, originally $22

Looking for even more sales? Shop more of Popsugar's editor-curated Amazon Prime Day Sale picks and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Plus, make sure you sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a moment of the sale.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deal on a Matte Lipstick

Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Matte Lip Tint ($8, originally $13)

The Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Matte Lip Tint is the perfect pick if you don't want to waste precious time reapplying. The shades are gorgeous, it doesn't leave a sticky feeling, and it'll leave your lips looking kissable AF. Our editor shared why it's worth the buy in her Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Matte Lip Tint review.

Editor Quote: "The lip tint has an incredibly smooth texture that provides a seamless glide on the lips without feeling sticky and I didn't have to reapply because the color is so long-lasting. I also love that the hue I tried, Coquettish, delivered a gorgeous shade of red that's not too much for everyday wear, directly catering to my newfound obsession." — Naomi Parris, assistant shopping editor

Best Amazon Prime Day Deal on a Liquid Matte Lipstick

The Lip Bar Liquid Matte Lipstick ($12, originally $14)

Looking for the perfect matte lipstick that'll leave your lips feeling smooth and hydrated? We've got you covered. Not only is this product long lasting, but the color payoff is award-worthy.

Editor Quote: "Of all the reds I've tried — and there have been a lot — this has to be the one that gets the most use. It's made with a formula that applies so smoothly and doesn't leave my lips feeling parched, and the deep-red color really does something to me when it comes to bringing out my inner boss b*tch." — Danielle Jackson, former assistant beauty editor

Best Amazon Prime Day Deal on a Plumping Lipstick

Mixik Plumping Lip Ampoule ($13, originally $16)

We're all about products that do double duty, which is why we love the Mixik Plumping Lip Ampoule. Not only does this product plump lips, but it comes in a bunch of fun colors so you can experiment with your favorite.

Editor Quote: I am a huge fan of Korean beauty brand, Mixik. I've been using its all-spray skin-care products for close to a year now and was so excited when they came out with lipsticks. As someone who doesn't wear makeup, I love to bless my pout with a fun color pop that is moisturizing and electric — Mixik Plumping Lip Ampoule manages to do both. The buildable lippie can go on semi-sheer or as bright as you'd like. It's formulated with Shea Butter and Argan Kernel Oil so you won't have to worry about it drying out your lips. Plus, the packaging is super fun!" — Natasha Marsh, contributing editor

Best Amazon Prime Day Deal on a Glossy Lipstick

Tarte Maracuja Juicy Lip Plump ($15, originally $27)

The Tarte Maracuja Juicy Lip Plump has gone viral several times over — and for good reason. Not only does this glossy stick lipstick give you a gorgeous sheen, but it's also made with a plumping formula that will leave your mouth looking luscious. Plus, it has hyaluronic acid to keep your lips soft and hydrated.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deal on a Sheer Lipstick

Laura Geller Italian Marble Sheer Lipstick ($17, originally $22)

Looking for a lip product that gives your lips, but better? Look no further than the Laura Geller Italian Marble Sheer Lipstick. This formula won't feather or migrate, but instead they'll give you a nice sheer tint of color that promises to last all day. Made with a marble formula that helps you fake fuller lips, this is the perfect product for any occasion.

Best Amazon Prime Day Deal on a Lipstick Set

Revlon Super Lustrous Glass Shine Balm Gift Set ($23, originally $27)

Want to stock up on a glassy lipstick that will keep your smile looking perfect? The Revlon Super Lustrous Glass Shine Balm Gift Set comes with three lipsticks, so you can share with a friend — or keep them all to yourself. This product is formulated with aloe and hyaluronic acid to smooth lines and nourish lips.
